channel.title: bm_c3a2e fire door moving switch [Fixed]
channel.description:
coolant area 1, fire door, this wall switch is moving up and down.. up high enough that it was out of view most of the time.
map : bm_c3a2e at: -199 x, -708 y, 928 z
[img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/542938787875071004/530A85B9538278E93DFA59135B98375459C196A4/[/img]

item.title: bm_c3a2e fire door moving switch [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: RiscIt
item.description:
Just noticed the door switch at the other end of this hallway has the same glitch.

EDIT: and both doors in the pumpstation 1 room (just ahead as you progress from the ones above).

If there are more I’m not going to report them as I suspect they are all related.

Read full topic
